metadata.title: CVE-2024-35983 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: bounds:Use the right number of bits for power-of-two CONFIG_NR_CPUS bits_per()rounds up to the next power of two when passed a power of two. This causescrashes on some machines and configurations.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
